response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its value and potential impact on your business, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $10,800. This represents an excellent opportunity to secure a high-quality solution at a competitive rate. I trust you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how we can make this product work for you.", "product_price": 10800}
